basics.name: Alexis Karl Buted
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I am expanding my knowledge in software engineering or cybersecurity. I am currently on my third year and I expect to graduate in Spring of 2026.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Oversee and manage the performance of employees.
highlights: Communicate with new employees in order to train them.
Create drinks for customers like coffee and shave ice.
Conduct coffee tours for tourists that come in.

volunteer.summary: To promote the Ilokano language and Philippine culture in the community
highlights: Keep a library of videos, pictures, and other documentary of events that take place.
Be responsible for uploading photos and videos taken at any and all Timpuyog events and activities.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Earned a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade, and have not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.

awards.title: Valedictorian
awards.summary: Recieved the title of valedictorian for earning a GPA of 4.0+.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in HACC 2021 for the high school division and won $1000.

awards.title: Certificate of Appreciation
awards.summary: Awarded for an outstanding demonstration of citizenship.
